title: How to Tame a Dangerous Husband - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Marriage of Convenience   Modern Day
author: 윤손
description: 'I don't want to marry that OO.' Hye-ri, Lee's illegitimate daughter, took the place of her stubborn half-sister after her rejection. He had a ruthless personality. He was a psychopath, a very pretty dangerous man.>
